translation: He from whom all the beings have evolved and by whom all this is pervaded, worshipping Him with his own duty, one attains perfection.
commentary: 18.46 Because from whom? Instinct (is) the evolution? of beings of beings? Yen by whom? Everything all? This is this? Tatam is pervaded? by his own actions with his own duty? Tam Him? Abhyarchya worshipping? Siddhi perfection? finds attains? human is man.Commentary The performance by a man of his own duty is simply carrying into effect the intention of the Supreme from Whom the whole of the creation emanates.
